name: AURA - Aura Unified Rich Architecture
short_description: Aura is a powerful architecture to build next generation Web 2.0 applications by unifying and integrating object oriented design(OOD) with technologies like Flex, AJAX and Hibernate.Provides its own test and prototype frameworks based on JUnit and Groovy
